name: HR
text: Welcome, we are happy to have you as the chief medical advisor for our Mr. President

name: HR
text: Let's begin reviewing some of the basic works you will encounter each day

name: HR
text: This here is a medicine called Tolazine

name: HR
text: It has some curing effects, but can also make the patient aggressive

name: HR
text: Try click it and put it in the tray

name: HR
text: Good job, this is how you deliver pills to the president!
